channel.title: Make your lighter have a HUGE flame
channel.description:
[size=20pt]DISCLAIMER: I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANYTHINY YOU DO WITH THIS[/size]
This is really cool if you do it right! All you need is a lighter that has an adjustable gas valve... like this [img]http://www.networds.com/remodel/images/artifacts/lighter.jpg[/img]
i cant give very many pics because I turned the fuel up too high and it sucked all the gas down...
Ok here we go...
Step 1: take the metal gaurd off Step 2: turn the gas up as far as you can Step 3: the gas control should be a black ring that goes around a white piece. Lift it up so it doesent turn the white peice and move it all the way to back to the left. Step 4: push the ring down Step 5: turn the gas up again. (thats double the gas) (optional) Step 6: repeat (optional) Step 7: put metal cover back on
it seems to have trouble lighting at really high gas levels but it will light if you do it right
EDIT: I forgot to say that I found this out on my own... I did not steal it

item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

Well, i do this all of the time. It is easier to suck in the gas to blow out fire. Also, another cool trick with this, is press the button and put your hand next to the part where the gas comes out(not lit) and it will squirt a little. Then, light your hand, goes away fast and its cool

item.title: Make your lighter have a HUGE flame
item.dc:creator: @pat-s pat-s
item.description:
@pat-s wrote:

A friend of mine sprayed something flammable (don’t remember what it was exactly) on his bedroom floor, and lit it… He had hardwood floors… Not so smart, but very funny.

You can also make some nice coloured flames by blowing powders like white flour into them. This only usually works with larger flames(like from a stove, barbecue or bonfire) but can look pretty cool.

I’ve seen the lighter thing done too (lots). For example: Someone took a lighter with the gas turned up inside a school desk (the kind that have a cubby-type thing) and just let it fill up with gas for a couple seconds, then lit it… That was pretty funny, especially since the teacher didn’t notice

Read full topic

item.description:
@philip_l_g wrote:

Nerice:

Get any areasol can, light lighter, and spray whats in the can towards the lighter. Suggest you aim the can at the end of the flame.

yeah just dont spray the tip of the lighter when you light it, the metal gets really hot and then makes a hole in the plastic, well it did to me, maybe a crappy lighter?
